title: Warm welcome for migrants in Munich
content:
Thousands more migrants and refugees have continued to make their way to Austria and Germany. 

The Austrian police estimate about 4,000 migrants crossed into the country on Sunday and police in Germany say up to 10,000 migrants are expected to reach Munich by the end of the day. 

However, Germany has warned that its willingness to help "should not be overstretched". 

Clive Myrie reports from Munich.
